Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NOME_BENEFICIARIO, GRAU_PARENTESCO, PCT_PART_BENEFICIA, DATA_INIVIGENCIA, COD_USUARIO, NUM_CPF FROM SEGUROS.V1BENEFICIA WHERE NUM_CERTIFICADO = :NUM_CERTIFICADO AND DATA_TERVIGENCIA = '9999-12-31' AND (NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE OR (NUM_APOLICE = 0 AND COD_USUARIO = 'SPBSC096')) END SQL
